name: Neutrally Jumpy
description:
You’re a time traveler trying to go back in time in order to keep Spain neutral during the World War. Keep jumping until you reach the yellow block to move to the next level and keep doing it until you beat the game. As you go through the unique levels see the different styles of gameplay. 

Instructions To Download Game:

1- Download the zipped folder 

2- Find the location of the folder in file manager 

3-  Right click the file/folder 

4- Choose Extract All 

5- Find the unzipped folder 

6- Open the folder 

7- Open WindowsNoEditor folder 

8- Double click CapstoneGame 

9- Play the game
